title: Sully Kothmann
text: Carlos Aneese "Sully" Kothmann (February 26, 1933 – May 5, 1986) was an American <a href="pair%20skater">pair skater</a>. After winning the bronze medal with partner <a href="Kay%20Servatius">Kay Servatius</a> at the 1953 U.S National Championships, he teamed with <a href="Lucille%20Ash">Lucille Ash</a>. He and Ash were twice silver medalists at the U.S. Championships and finished seventh at the <a href="1956%20Winter%20Olympics">1956 Winter Olympics</a>. He was born in <a href="San%20Antonio%2C%20Texas">San Antonio, Texas</a>.
